readable.title: 2745811124_12c4426b8b
readable.content: A blond girl standing in a crowd holding a goat on a leash . A girl holding a sheep by the leash in a busy fair setting A girl in a crowd in holding on to a leashed sheep . A little girl is in a crowd of people holding a rope attached to a sheep . The young girl is holding a yellow leash attached to a sheep .
